entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 a.m. PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 10.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 12:00 AM PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 10.9°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
